name: teal
content:
teal noun
(BIRD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a small wild duck: We saw ducks, swans, geese, and teals.
/GettyImages

teal noun
(COLOUR)
[ U ] a dark greenish-blue colour: The wallpaper comes in teal and chocolate. The shoes were in the same shade of teal as the bag she got last summer.
/GettyImages

having a dark greenish-blue colour: She bought a new teal dress for the wedding. In the 1980s I was putting on teal eyeliner and wearing legwarmers.
More examplesFewer examplesThey wore long teal gowns.She wore a long iridescent teal velvet gown with gold and silver thread.The package was tied with teal ribbon.
